====== Feature type

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]

|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:targeted-survey-ecological-community-protocol-shapes:species-and-cover:feature-type`
|Label | Feature type
|Definition | The value of `tern:featureType` _MUST_ be link: http://linked.data.gov.au/def/tern-cv/b311c0d3-4a1a-4932-a39c-f5cdc1afa611[`plant occurrence`].
|Comment | TERN's ecologists have determined the feature type is _plant occurrence_, defined by the link:https://www.publish.csiro.au/book/5230/[Australian Soil and Land Survey Field Handbook].
